Automate ticket sales & process payments over WhatsApp

Automate how your customers pay for your goods or services by using the most popular messaging platform

Bringing conversational sales to the ticketing industry

Our platform will automate your ticket sales and mobile money payment processing on Whatsapp. We provide you with a dashboard to keep track of your sales and reach out to customers with promotions and marketing material.

Improve the sales process

Processes multiple customer requests simultaneously 24/7/365 and increase the speed of serving customers.

Manage and track your sales with real time reporting and analytics from any device.

Gain useful data insights

Easily store customer details and segment customers for future marketing.

Easily analyse keywords, sentiments, and customer segments to get deeper insights on you customers.

Reduce overhead costs

Reduce staff time for routine customer service and marketing costs over time.

Automate FAQs to free up customer service reps to focus on high-value conversations and tasks.

Reduce theft and fraud

Reduce risks related to the handling of cash by agents and prevent the risk of forged tickets.

Process M-Pesa payments directly to your account on messaging platforms.

Get early access to the Whatsapp Business API

The Whatsapp Business API is complicated due to its end-to-end encryption and getting permission is hard. We make it easy and quick to get a verified Whatsapp Business API phone number for clients that want a dedicated line. We also offer a shared Saada number that you can setup and use in minutes.

  • Use Cases
  • Events
  • Entertainment
  • Travel
Events of all formats and sizes can sell tickets and collect feedback and insights to better plan future events.
Cinemas, night clubs, amusement parks can easily communicate and sell packages.
Road, rail, or air enable travellers book their trip from your selection of destinations.
